hiveArticle.title: üì∑ #Photography : Ravindra Nath Tagore Statue
hiveArticle.body:
It's always hard to find the right photo to click. I know it is not the greatest of photos but would like to share with you all. One important fact about Ravindra Nath Tagore is that he has written the national anthems of two countries India's Jana Gana Mana and Bangladesh's Amar Shonar Bangla whereas the Sri Lankan national anthem was inspired by his work. 

He was a great poet and people remember him for his work done.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmevZzYKQdbCuo4gGSmoDWM4cGEYinW9Xfb1WiHqEfMwLv/image.png)
